sourcesContent:
import React, {useState} from 'react'
import { BrowserRouter as Router, Route, Switch } from 'react-router-dom'
import Main from '../pages/layouts/Main'
import MainAdmin from '../pages/layouts/MainAdmin'
//Admin
import dataFake from '../../dataFake'
import Dashboard from '../../pages/views/Admin/Dashboard'
import Products from '../../pages/views/Admin/Products'
import AddProduct from '../../pages/views/Admin/AddProduct'
import EditProduct from '../../pages/views/Admin/EditProduct'
import DetailProduct from '../../pages/views/Admin/DetailProduct'

//Views
import Home from '../pages/views/Main/Home'
import Shop from '../pages/views/Main/Shop'
import Product from '../pages/views/Main/Product'

const Routers = ({ products, onRemove }) => {
    
    const onHandleRemove = (id) => {
        const newProducts = products.filter(product => product.id !== id);
        setProduct(newProducts);
    }

    const onHandleAdd = (product) => {
        const newProduct = {
        id: products.length + 1,
        ...product
        }
        setProduct([...products, newProduct])
    }

    const onHandleEdit = (product) => {
       setProduct(product);
    }
    return (
        <Router>
            <Switch>
                <Route path="/admin/:path?" exact>
                    <MainAdmin>
                        <Switch>
                            <Route path="/admin" exact>
                                <Dashboard />
                            </Route>
                            <Route path="/admin/products">
                                <Products products = {products} onRemove={onHandleRemove}/>
                            </Route>
                            <Route path="/admin/add-product">
                                <AddProduct onAdd={onHandleAdd}/>
                            </Route>
                            <Route path="/admin/edit-product/:id">
                                <EditProduct products = {products} onEdit={onHandleEdit}/>
                            </Route>
                            <Route path="/admin/detail-product/:id">
                                <DetailProduct products = {products} />
                            </Route>
                        </Switch>
                    </MainAdmin>
                </Route>
                <Route>
                    <Main>
                        <Switch>
                            <Route path="/" exact>
                                <Home />
                            </Route>
                            <Route path="/shop">
                                <Shop />
                            </Route>
                            <Route path="/product">
                                <Product />
                            </Route>
                        </Switch>
                    </Main>
                </Route>
            </Switch>
        </Router>
    )
}

Routers.propTypes = {

}

export default Routers
